message: http://chocolatey.org/ Finally Application Manager for Windows :D kinda Apt-Like
name: Chocolatey Gallery
caption: chocolatey.org
description: To install chocolatey now, open an administrative cmd.exe command prompt and paste the text from the box below and press enter (or click ). For administrative PowerShell copy the second box (). If you need to install as a non-administrator or want more advanced options, see Advanced.

data.message:
That's what Scott Hanselman kinda said 
http://www.hanselman.com/blog/IsTheWindowsUserReadyForAptget.aspx
It's not new or unpopular, but I expect it to hype a bit among developers now as Atom for Windows uses it.
